{{fr-adj}}

# {{lb|fr|politics}} Describing a system in which [[voter]]s vote for a [[president]] as well as a [[member]] of a [[parliament]] or similar body
types.html:
bireprésentatif (feminine bireprésentative, masculine plural bireprésentatifs, feminine plural bireprésentatives)

  1. (politics) Describing a system in which voters vote for a president as well as a member of a parliament or similar body
trans: Describing a system in which voters vote for a president as well as a member of a parliament or similar body
